attributes.action: Ban the sale of Israeli products until Israel ends its military actions in Gaza
attributes.additional_details: We feel Israel is acting with impunity and UN sanctions will not work because the US, UK, EU nations, and others continue to support it and sell it weapons. We believe that we must make every effort to stop Israel’s actions in Gaza, and we believe a ban on Israeli products could help.
attributes.background: Israel has bombed Gaza, an enclave of over 2 million people, for more than 18 months. Cutting-edge military hardware is harming civilians, with thousands dead and many of the survivors starving. We believe we should act with our wallets and ban the sale of Israeli products in the UK.
